pkgmetadata.longdescription: Flexible cFDR // Provides functions to implement the Flexible cFDR (Hutchinson et al. (2021) doi:10.1371/journal.pgen.1009853) and Binary cFDR (Hutchinson et al. (2021) doi:10.1101/2021.10.21.465274) methodologies to leverage auxiliary data from arbitrary distributions, for example functional genomic data, with GWAS p-values to generate re-weighted p-values.
